title: Exploitation of related species for developing superior adapted wheat varieties
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Work is at too early a stage for exploitation.
findingsText: This is a programme designed to transferring introgressions from distant relatives in UK wheat varieties into Brazilian wheat varieties. The research programme is still at too early a stage to draw any specific conclusions on the work undertaken. The germplasm will be exploited by public and commercially funded breeding programmes in Brazil and South America. Agriculture, Food and Drink
